CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 17, 1946, pg .17 reads: "...Queen - A winsome miss Vivian V. Clayton, niece of Mr. and Mrs. Theron B. Hamilton of Herron Avenue, pauses for a moment of relaxation on the Carnegie Tech tennis court during an afternoon work-out last week. Miss Clayton, a resident of the Motor City, is a regular summer visitor. - Harris Photo.
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Vivian V. Clayton, wearing two-piece tennis outfit, kneeling on grass leaning on tennis racket
